titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Glenn. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S.RES. 71 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 2/2/1993--Introduced. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs for the 103d Congress.
